name: City Construction Euro Truck3d
description:
City Construction Truck Simulator

first person off road driving and heavy machinery handling are the awesome features that make off road architecture simulator an amazing 3d simulator of 2016.
Drive construction trucks, excavators, road rollers and other heavy machinery and lead the construction at off road hills and mountains.
Driving, Construction, Heavy vehicle handling and off road driving adventure. Be perfect in your construction day duty. Handle each job with your construction and driving skills.
Heavy machinery driving on off road environment is a challenge for driving & simulation lovers.
Asbulldozer crane operator, use claw machine to scoop rocks and debris off the roads.
The challenging game involves various tasks to test your driving and road constitution skills.

Key features:

Multiple vehicle driving and handling

Smooth Steering, Hydraulic Brakes, Lifting and Rotation Controls

Amazing Off Road Hill Climbing

Control giant road roller and bulldozer
